tasks.name: 01 Verify / Apply dependencies
tasks.description: VS Code task wrapper for `scripts/task-verify-apply-dependencies.ps1` (VIPC apply for 32- and 64-bit)

tasks.name: 02 Build LVAddon (VI Package)
tasks.description: VS Code task using IntegrationEngineCli (wrapper by default, managed on Windows) for 64-bit VIP + both-bitness PPLs

tasks.name: 05b Requirements summary (bundled SD)
tasks.description: VS Code task running run-requirements-summary-task.ps1 (prefers bundled RequirementsSummarizer.exe) for SD consumers

scenarios: regenerate markdown/html/high summaries from bundled CSV
fallback to dotnet run if the bundled exe is missing

tasks.name: 08 x-cli: VI Analyzer
tasks.description: VS Code task running x-cli vi-analyzer-run with configs/vi-analyzer-request.sample.json

tasks.name: 09 x-cli: VI History (vi-compare-run)
tasks.description: VS Code task running x-cli vi-compare-run with configs/vi-compare-run-request.sample.json

tasks.name: 09b x-cli: VI History from SD (read-only)
tasks.description: VS Code task running vi-history replay against an extracted Source Distribution (read-only analysis, no bind/build)

scenarios: sample replay using extracted SD root
failure + disabled scenarios reused from configs

tasks.name: SD: VI History (bundled)
tasks.description: VS Code task for SD consumers to run vi-history replay via run-vi-history-suite-sd.ps1 (bundled, read-only)

scenarios: sample replay using extracted SD root

tasks.name: SD: Build x-cli (bundled)
tasks.description: VS Code task to build x-cli inside the extracted SD (Release/win-x64)

scenarios: dotnet build -c Release win-x64 publishable binaries

tasks.name: SD: VI History (execute)
tasks.description: VS Code task to run vi-history replay from SD with execution enabled (depends on SD: Build x-cli)

tasks.name: 20 Build: Source Distribution
tasks.description: VS Code task running scripts/build-source-distribution/Build_Source_Distribution.ps1 to emit Source Distribution manifests and zip

tasks.name: 21 Verify: Source Distribution
tasks.description: VS Code task running OrchestrationCli source-dist-verify to validate source-distribution.zip commits and emit a verification report

scenarios: strict commit validation against git history

tasks.name: 21 VIPB: Bump LabVIEW version
tasks.description: VS Code task running scripts/labview/vipb-bump-worktree.ps1 to build the seed docker image, bump seed.vipb version, and create a one-commit-ahead worktree

scenarios: seed image built from repo (fork owner tag)
worktree created and commit applied with bumped VIPB

tasks.name: 06 DevMode: Bind (auto)
tasks.description: VS Code task wrapping task-devmode-bind.ps1 (Mode=bind, auto-resolves LabVIEW version/bitness from VIPB) to bind LocalHost.LibraryPaths via DevModeAgentCli

tasks.name: 06b DevMode: Unbind (auto)
tasks.description: VS Code task wrapping task-devmode-bind.ps1 (Mode=unbind, auto-resolves LabVIEW version/bitness from VIPB) to unbind LocalHost.LibraryPaths via DevModeAgentCli

tasks.name: 06c DevMode: Clear/Unbind all LabVIEW versions
tasks.description: VS Code task running clear-labview-librarypaths-all.ps1 to remove LocalHost.LibraryPaths entries for all detected LabVIEW versions (32/64) and run restore per version/bitness.

tasks.name: 17 Build (isolated worktree)
tasks.description: Runs scripts/run-worktree-task.ps1 to build in a temporary git worktree (dedicated console/notifications).

tasks.name: 18 Probe helper smoke
tasks.description: Runs scripts/test/probe-helper-smoke.ps1 to validate worktree, source, and cache tiers for the repo CLI resolver.
